SELECT "composite_key" AS "cmpyKey" , "news_date" AS "newsDate" , "company_name" AS "cmpyName" , round(cast(ta_score as numeric),4) AS "taScre" , "news_title" AS "newsTtl" , "ext_morphs" AS "extMorp"
FROM NLP."nlp_news" where (company_name like concat('%',#{cmpyNameOnly},'%') or raw_data like concat('%',#{cmpyNameOnly},'%') or news_title like concat('%',#{cmpyNameOnly},'%') ) AND (news_date between '2015-01-01' and '2020-12-31') order by news_date desc limit 10000
SELECT "company" as "company" , "date" as "date" , "closing_price" as "price" FROM NLP."nlp_stock" WHERE company LIKE concat('%',#{cmpyNameOnly},'%') ORDER BY date
